946560329487589376.text: It was drizzling in Northern California this week. Perhaps we can finally stop worrying about fire prevention, contrary to what all those “firemen” are saying. While the US — voluntarily — pledged the most of any country with $3B, the UK, Japan, Germany and France jointly pledged $5B in contributions into the Green Climate Fund. 946566681840689152.text: I’ll stop now. It’s not worth getting irate about. He won’t spend the time to understand it. It’ll take a while longer, but history — and the rest of the world — will overcome such temporary challenges. Someone will make America smart again.
